meanings.definition: a type of plant with a strong, unpleasant odor
meanings.sent1: The stinkweeds in the garden made my nose scrunch up.
meanings.sent2: The stinkweeds grew wild along the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The stinkweeds seemed to be playing a prank on our noses.
meanings.sent4: The stinkweeds filled the air with their pungent perfume.
meanings.sent5: The stinkweeds were like little odor factories in the field.

meanings.sent1: The garbage bin stinkweeds near the back of the house.
meanings.sent2: The old cheese stinkweeds from the fridge when opened.
meanings.sent3: The skunk stinkweeds loudly as a defense mechanism.
meanings.sent4: The rotten eggs stinkweeds throughout the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The sewer stinkweeds worse than anything I had ever smelled.

meanings.sent1: The room was filled with a stinkweeds odor.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can was so stinkweeds that no one wanted to go near it.
meanings.sent3: The stinkweeds cheese made the whole fridge smell funky.
meanings.sent4: The stinkweeds socks in the locker room were unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The stinkweeds smell lingered long after the skunk had left.
